data.eml:eml: Bees of the genus Sphecodes Latreille 1804 of Siberia, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Astafurova, Yulia V., Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu. (2015): Bees of the genus Sphecodes Latreille 1804 of Siberia, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Halictidae). Zootaxa 4052 (1): 65-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4052.1.3
